item.title: The Ponerinae
item.dc:creator: Illya King
item.description: A free-range patty with no added hormones, steroids, or antibiotics, topped with American cheese products and crispy onion straws.
item.content:encoded:
A free-range patty with no added hormones, steroids, or antibiotics, topped with American cheese products and crispy onion straws.

item.title: The Myrmicinae
item.dc:creator: Illya King
item.description: ﻿The Greatest Burger in Rose City. Pack full of protein, topped with lettuce, tomato, and pickles. This burger is 100% organic and animal cruelty free.
item.content:encoded:
﻿The Greatest Burger in Rose City. Pack full of protein, topped with lettuce, tomato, and pickles. This burger is 100% organic and animal cruelty free.
